d_cats.name: Chatbot
d_cats.description: General prompts for interacting with a chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for general chatbot inquiries.
Includes a wide range of topics.

d_cats.name: Instructions
d_cats.description: Prompts for giving instructions to the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for directing the chatbot to perform specific tasks.
Includes commands and procedural instructions.

d_cats.name: Roleplay
d_cats.description: Prompts for engaging in roleplay scenarios with the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for interactive storytelling and roleplay.
Includes character-based prompts and scenarios.

d_cats.name: Small Talk
d_cats.description: Prompts for casual conversation with the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for friendly, everyday chat.
Includes greetings, farewells, and general chit-chat.

d_cats.name: Jokes
d_cats.description: Prompts for telling jokes or asking for jokes from the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for humor and entertainment.
Includes joke requests and funny anecdotes.

d_cats.name: Advice
d_cats.description: Prompts for seeking advice from the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for personal guidance and suggestions.
Includes life advice, relationship tips, and more.

d_cats.name: Trivia
d_cats.description: Prompts for asking trivia questions or participating in trivia games with the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for testing knowledge and learning new facts.
Includes various trivia topics and quizzes.

d_cats.name: Storytelling
d_cats.description: Prompts for telling or listening to stories from the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for narrative-based interactions.
Includes story requests and creative writing prompts.

d_cats.name: Quotes
d_cats.description: Prompts for requesting quotes from the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for inspirational and famous quotes.
Includes motivational sayings and historical quotes.

d_cats.name: News
d_cats.description: Prompts for discussing current events and news with the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for staying updated with the latest news.
Includes news summaries and discussions.

d_cats.name: Weather
d_cats.description: Prompts for inquiring about the weather.
sidenotes: Use for weather updates and forecasts.
Includes current weather conditions and future predictions.

d_cats.name: Games
d_cats.description: Prompts for playing games with the chatbot.
sidenotes: Use for interactive and fun activities.
Includes word games, puzzles, and challenges.
